original_title: Ivy Gold - Live at the Jovel 2021
overview: 2022, FIRST TOUR – FIRST LIVE RECORDING! After the phenomenal debut, the multinational bluesrock band is back with their first live recording!  In November 2021, IVY GOLD played their very first live shows with the awesome studio line-up and the show in Münster @ Jovel was recorded live on stage. The „Jovel“ is an amazing venue that was founded in 1979 by Sfeffi Stephan from the Udo Lindenberg Band. Over the years, people experienced many unforgettable concert highlights with bands such as the Simple Minds or Miles Davis. Now the „Jovel“ has also become IVY GOLD’s home and is perpetuated on the bands DVD „Live at the Jovel“. IVY GOLD took care of a huge production including 6 high end live cameras and some extra fancy light scenarios. The audio mix & mastering was done by Yossi Shakked in Los Angeles.
title: Ivy Gold - Live at the Jovel 2021
